pkgmetadata.longdescription: Synoptic Climate Classification and Spatial Regionalization of Environmental Data // Set of functions to compute different types of synoptic classification methods and for analysing their effect on environmental variables. More information about the methods used in Lemus-Canovas et al. 2019 DOI:10.1016/j.atmosres.2019.01.018 and Martin-Vide et al. 2008 DOI:10.5194/asr-2-99-2008.
